title: 2026 will clarify Europeâ€™s new priorities for space
summary: The article discusses Europe's evolving priorities in the space sector for 2026, including launcher competitions, defense budgets, exploration commitments, and the progress of key companies like ICEYE, D-Orbit, and The Exploration Company. ICEYE is mentioned as pivoting toward defense and military markets but no concrete deal is described.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.involvement: pivoting toward defense and military markets

entities.name: D-Orbit
